about_the_game:
10 Players Battle Royale Mode:

Embrace the essence of Survival Horror with a thrilling Battle Royale twist where 10 players must kill each other and only one will be left. Cursed monsters also roam the dark corridors of the mansion, where 3 floors are closing in until only one floor remains. Collect items, make upgrades, find valuable rewards, hide and kill everything that moves. Every second counts as you fight to survive and escape the mansion's deadly countdown. Being the last survival feels like a deadly sweet pleasure.

Singleplayer Challenges:

You can also challenge yourself offline, just like in the online matches. Get better from killing easy bots to facing cold-blooded smart bots. Unlock 100% of the achievements and complete challenges in this simple, fun, and rewarding single-player experience.

Complex Combat System:

Engage in intense combat with guns and brutal melee weapons for up-close agressive gore encounters. Every shot, every swing, and every decision could be the difference between life and death.

Unpredictable Nightmares:

No two playthroughs are ever the same. With random generated levels, every exploration presents new challenges and horrors. Adapt, strategize and use your wits to outsmart the mansion's malevolent forces.

And many more cursed features...

short_description: Multiplayer Horror: 10 Players have to kill each other in a 3 floors mansion full of monsters which every floor closes after a deadly countdown. Shoot, stab, hide, upgrade and face unpredictable random map generations. The last one breathing wins. You can also play offline against smart cruel bots.
